durabilityDamagePerBlock.description: Lumber Axe durability damage per log destroyed.

chopLimit.description: 1500 above is not recommended. It Does work but it's not recommended.

includedLog.description:
Included blocks for custom logs, but any custom or vanilla logs also work as long as the block identifier ends with "*_log".
Check: https://github.com/mcbe-mods/Cut-tree-one-click by Lete114.

excludedLog.description:
Excluded blocks for block logs you don't want to be included in being chopped.

Tip:
- excludedLog is prioritized over includedLog.
- It's unnecessary to include log blocks that have "*_log" in their block id.

disableWatchDogTerminateLog.description: Disables the watchDogTerminate Log message. If true, it will only show a warning message when you enable content-ui log in the Minecraft settings.
